email.subject: [PROJECT NAME] - [TASK] - [OWNER] - DUE [TASK DUE] - STATUS: [STATUS]
email.body:
Dear [OWNER], You have been assigned the following task. Please confirm your estimated completion date as soon as possible.
Task: [TASK] Status: [STATUS] Due Date: [TASK DUE] Project Name: [PROJECT NAME] Project Gate: [PROJECT GATE] Gate Due Date: [GATE DUE]
For your convenience, the following documents have been attached to this email: - NPD Gate Deliverable List - Program PDS - Latest Monthly PMO Review Slides - Current NPD Program Dashboard
In the event the activity becomes past due, it will automatically be escalated and assigned to the following manager:
[MANAGER] [MANAGER EMAIL]
Thanks for your continued support, Sullair Program Management
